name: geopython.github.com
body:
### geopython

![geopython](https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/07ff41421ea99ba1c3bc3af3783d438d?s=100)geopython is a GitHub organization comprised of [Python](http://python.org/) projects related to geospatial.

* [OWSLib] (OWSLib)
* [pycsw] (http://pycsw.org/)
* [PyWPS] (http://pywps.wald.intevation.org/)
* [MetaSearch] (https://github.com/geopython/MetaSearch)
* [CadTools] (http://plugins.qgis.org/plugins/cadtools/)

Also join us in [irc://freenode.net/#geopython](irc://freenode.net/#geopython).

For more geospatial projects, check out the [Toblerity Project](http://toblerity.github.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
